title.rendered: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold2 5G Charger, Genuine Samsung 25W USB-C Super Fast UK Mains Wall Charger & USB-C Cable for Galaxy Z…

content.rendered:
Genuine Samsung 25W USB-C Super Fast Adaptive Plug ( EP-TA800 ) & USB-C to USB-C Cable ( EP-DG977 ) – Genuine Samsung 25W USB-C Super Fast Adaptive Plug & USB-C to USB-C Cable means you get the unique Samsung Accessories to cost and sync with the Best Quality from Samsung. “With super fast 25W charging, this will power up your phone to 50% in less than 30 minutes. No more waiting around for your phone to charge”. As a added bonus we’re additionally offering on this bundle a MOBACE Nylon Braided TYPE-C / USB-C Cable Box Contains 25W Super Fast Adaptor , USB-C to USB-C Cable & MOBACE TYPE-C / USB-C Cable

Make certain this suits by getting into your mannequin quantity.
Genuine Samsung 25W USB-C Super Fast Adaptive Plug ( EP-TA800 ) & USB-C to USB-C Cable ( EP-DG977 ) – Genuine Samsung 25w USB-C Super Fast Adaptive Plug & USB-C to USB-C Cable means you get the unique Samsung Accessories to cost and sync with the Best Quality from Samsung. “With super fast 25w charging, this will power up your phone to 50% in less than 30 minutes. No more waiting around for your phone to charge”.
Perfect Combination – Our 100% Genuine Samsung Products imply you can cost your new telephone with the equipment that have been made for your telephone. No extra aftermarket cables and adaptors. Buy Original. Buy Excellent
For New Samsung Phones – Compatible with New Samsung Galaxy Z Fold2 5G and all Type C Android Phones!
Samsung Super Fast Charging OUTPUT: 5.0V @ 3.0 AMPS or 9.0V @2.77 AMPS (PPS) 3.3 – 5.9V @3.0 AMPS or 3.3 – 11.0V @ 2.25 AMPS
Our Promise – Fan Favourite 6 Month Warranty, 1 X Genuine Samsung 25w USB-C Super Fast Adaptive Plug, 1 X GENUINE USB-C to USB-C Cable, 1 X Braided Type C Cable & Our Dedicated Customer Service Team
